radiographic_examinations.findings: The hepatic parenchyma appears within normal limits. The contour of the liver is smooth. There is no focal liver mass. A tiny amount of ascites is seen in the right upper quadrant. There is no intrahepatic biliary dilation. The CHD measures 2 mm. The gallbladder is distended, but there is no evidence of stones or gallbladder wall thickening. Biliary sludge is noted near the gallbladder neck. The pancreas is not well visualized. Normal echogenicity of the spleen measuring 14.0 cm.
